The sizing receives mixed feedback - while some find it true to size, others mention the sleeves are too long. Customers disagree on how flattering it is, with some finding it flattering on their curves while others say it's not flattering at all. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this dress!
items.body: Really liked this piece. It was comfortable, thick, and sexy. I have an athletic body type, so I appreciate something that has some room in the shoulders. It wasn't form fitting (which I prefer), but it was still structured enough to give you a nice silhouette. The shade of purple was perhaps a teeny bit darker, but pretty close to the photo. Overall I am happy with my purchase. Read more
items.author: Candace

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband said it look very seductive
items.body: Fits way better than i thought it would. It make my butt look big and I don't even have any butt lol Read more
items.author: Tam

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Size up on this dress because it does fit a bit snug. This is a cute casual outfit. I have worn in the fall and the winter and it was warm! Read more
items.author: HaulsByHaley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT!!!
items.body: This dress fit PERFECTLY! Definitely size down, I’m normally a Large/XL due to my large breast, but after reading the comments about the sizes I purchased a medium and it was just right! When I first tired it on it was a bit itchy, but a few days later when I wore it, it was fine. I’m going to order more in different colors Read more
items.author: Bobbie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars TRUE TO SIZE AND PERFECT FOR CHUNCK!!
items.body: This dress is simply beautiful! Really boosts my confidence! It’s nice and warm due to the thickness, a little short but overall nice! So no bending over if you drop anything. Very comfortable though! Worth the money for sure! Read more
items.author: Kylie Q.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars I didn’t like it
items.body: I didn’t like the material and doesn’t have shape Read more
items.author: Paola Basto

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars HUGE and too long!
items.body: The sizes are crazy! I’m usually a large being 5’3 160lbs and saw the reviews to size down so I ordered a medium and it was still VERY large! The sleeves were too long and could have covered my hands easily, and the dress itself could have been 5 inches shorter than where it was. It might not look it on the picture but this dress was wayyyy to long in the back and almost covered the top of my boots. It would have been more flattering if it was a little shorter but maybe it’s not for the short girlies. The color of the dress was spot on from the photos and I liked that about it. The material was a little itchy but with a sweater dress it’s to be expected. It seemed very warm for the duration I had it on and was a little heavy which could have pulled the material down longer. I would have also needed shapewear as it did not work with my curves so I ended up returning it but it was a good try. I would not get it even if it I got the smallest size, the sizing just seems way too unpredictable. Read more
items.author: H&D

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Lantern Sleeves/Black, Light Brown, Sweater Dress/Dark Green, Knit/Pink, Lantern Sleeves/Burgundy, Sweater Dress/Black, Dark Grey, Army Green, Knit/Dark Red, Solid/Black, Navy Blue, Coffee Brown, Christmas Black, Knit/Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
